name: RCPG
description:
RCPG is a fast paced arcade combat-racing game, where you can drive remote controlled cars through tracks. fun obstacles ,combat abilities, maneuverability and boost.

Key features:
  • 7 championship trophies in single player mode(Solo or Vs local player)
  • 2 different environment includes 6 tracks to play
  • 3 cars
  • 3 unique weapons, Rockets, Mine, Oil Trap
  • 2 players split-screen multiplayer
  • Time trials
  • local leaderboard

Keyboard, gamepad and joysticks are supported
